---
name: Theory Proposal
about: Submit a theoretical claim with derivation and testable prediction
title: "[Theory] "
labels: theory
assignees: ""
---

## Claim

State the theoretical claim in one or two sentences.

## Supporting Derivation or Citation

Provide the mathematical derivation, proof sketch, or literature citation
that supports the claim.

## Testable Prediction

What observable or computable consequence follows from this claim?
How would we confirm or falsify it?

## Connection to Existing Work

How does this relate to papers or modules already in the repository
(e.g., DRR, Coherence Depth, CSL)?
